name: BloXoR
summary: BloXoR, an original puzzle game with a tilt! Take the dexterity of the average marble-in-a-box game and add a puzzle-solving twist-- all of the Blox move! Tilt and slide the Blox, rearrange them, reconfigure them, each level is a custom designed puzzle box with its own unique solution, part puzzle, part dexterity.
